snippet: After fleeing to Israel following an immigration raid in 2008, a former manager at a kosher slaughterhouse in Iowa appeared in a federal court in Cedar Rapids on Friday.
abstract: Hosam Amara, former manager at Agriprocessors kosher slaughterhouse in Iowa who fled to Israel following immigration raid in 2008, appears in federal court to face charges that he conspired to exploit immigrant workers.
lead_paragraph: After fleeing to Israel following an immigration raid in 2008, a former manager at a kosher slaughterhouse in Iowa appeared in a federal court in Cedar Rapids on Friday.

headline.main: Iowa: Poultry Plant Manager Faces Charges in Court
headline.print_headline: Iowa: Poultry Plant Manager Faces Charges In Court
